chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Hello all, my name is Krish Nayak and welcome to my YouTube channel.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: So guys, finally I am announcing the NLP live community session for both machine learning and deep learning.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Here I am not going to tell you that for how many days it will be going ahead,

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: but here I will plan in such a way that I will start from basics NLP

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: and it will be going on till we complete the entire NLP for both machine learning and deep learning.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Now, with respect to the dates that we are planning to start,

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: it will be from next week Tuesday, that is 14th June 2022.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Every day I will be coming live at 7pm and we will be starting our NLP session from basics.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: I am going to cover many libraries like NLTK, Spacey in case of machine learning,

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: then we will go to What2Vec, we will understand the libraries with respect to GenSim

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: and then we will be moving towards RNN, LSTM, RNN, Bidirectional LSTM, RNN,

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: then we will again cover Transformers and finally BERT and we will do a lot of practical sessions.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: So till now I have taken so many different kind of community sessions,

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: let it be stats, machine learning, deep learning, you know, and people liked it.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Even I have covered community sessions with respect to EDA.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: So my plan is again to make sure that the community learns in a proper way.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: So my suggestion will be that please make sure that you subscribe to the channel,

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: press the bell notification icon so that whenever I go live from next week on Tuesday onwards,

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: at every, basically every day at 7pm, you should be getting the notification from my side.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Now the other thing is that all the materials related to this NLP sessions

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: will be uploaded in the dashboard that will be given in the description of this particular video

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: so that none of your materials gets missed.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Even the video links will be put up over there as we will be conducting all the sessions.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: So I hope everybody attends those sessions.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: One special request from your side, since we are doing this for community building,

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: please make sure that you share this video with everyone.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Tag me, let it be in LinkedIn, in other platforms, Twitter and all.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: I will definitely provide you an amazing response over there.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: But again, understand why we are doing this specifically to teach people in a better way.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: This entire session will actually help you to crack interviews or perform better in the interviews

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: because I will also be covering a lot of interview questions as we go ahead.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: So yes, please make sure that again, please, please, please share this video with everyone.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: It will be definitely beneficial for the people, for everyone out there.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: So yes, I will be seeing you in Tuesday's session.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Till then, have a great day.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: I will see you all in the next video.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Bye-bye.

chunks.title: Announcing NLP Live community Sessions
chunks.text: Take care.

text: Hello all, my name is Krish Nayak and welcome to my YouTube channel. So guys, finally I am announcing the NLP live community session for both machine learning and deep learning. Here I am not going to tell you that for how many days it will be going ahead, but here I will plan in such a way that I will start from basics NLP and it will be going on till we complete the entire NLP for both machine learning and deep learning. Now, with respect to the dates that we are planning to start, it will be from next week Tuesday, that is 14th June 2022. Every day I will be coming live at 7pm and we will be starting our NLP session from basics. I am going to cover many libraries like NLTK, Spacey in case of machine learning, then we will go to What2Vec, we will understand the libraries with respect to GenSim and then we will be moving towards RNN, LSTM, RNN, Bidirectional LSTM, RNN, then we will again cover Transformers and finally BERT and we will do a lot of practical sessions. So till now I have taken so many different kind of community sessions, let it be stats, machine learning, deep learning, you know, and people liked it. Even I have covered community sessions with respect to EDA. So my plan is again to make sure that the community learns in a proper way. So my suggestion will be that please make sure that you subscribe to the channel, press the bell notification icon so that whenever I go live from next week on Tuesday onwards, at every, basically every day at 7pm, you should be getting the notification from my side. Okay. Now the other thing is that all the materials related to this NLP sessions will be uploaded in the dashboard that will be given in the description of this particular video so that none of your materials gets missed. Even the video links will be put up over there as we will be conducting all the sessions. So I hope everybody attends those sessions. One special request from your side, since we are doing this for community building, please make sure that you share this video with everyone. Tag me, let it be in LinkedIn, in other platforms, Twitter and all. I will definitely provide you an amazing response over there. But again, understand why we are doing this specifically to teach people in a better way. This entire session will actually help you to crack interviews or perform better in the interviews because I will also be covering a lot of interview questions as we go ahead. So yes, please make sure that again, please, please, please share this video with everyone. It will be definitely beneficial for the people, for everyone out there. So yes, I will be seeing you in Tuesday's session. Till then, have a great day. I will see you all in the next video. Bye-bye. Take care.
